entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who will be missed by Harry Potter. He says goodbye to Harry as he leaves the Great Hall.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry who is participating in the second task. He is running towards the judges to complete his task.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry who is watching Harry Potter's second task. He gets sent flying by Harry as he runs past.

entities.name: denis creevey
entities.description: Denis Creevey is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry who is watching Harry Potter's second task. He gets sent flying by Harry as he runs past.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is a large dining hall at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where students have breakfast before the second task.

entities.name: second task
entities.description: The second task is an event in which Harry Potter must complete a challenge to progress in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: dragons' enclosure
entities.description: The dragons' enclosure is a location where dragons are kept. It was previously surrounded by seats, but now they are on the opposite bank of the lake.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: The lake is a body of water at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where students can watch the second task from the stands.

relationships.description: Harry Potter says goodbye to Dobby as he leaves the Great Hall.
Harry Potter sends Colin Creevey flying as he runs past him in the corridor.
Harry Potter sends Denis Creevey flying as he runs past him in the corridor.
